name: Justen, halp! (HealthyDeveloper)
description:
"Congratulations, you successfully escaped your broken spaceship. Welcome to R.I.A. The escape capsule with most comfort in space. We wish you good travels." While one player is continiously repairing the space capsule, the coop-player gives the commands how to do it. The Capsule is a 3D room, that can be moved around in. Consoles in the capsule feature several different riddles that demand communication between players, while one player has the manual of the capsule in front of him/her. The game can also be played as a singeplayer game.

Please consult the manual.pdf in the files or the google drive (R.I.A. Manual)
